configuration.redirectUri: Enter the Redirect URI that you set on Azure Portal, e.g. http://localhost:4200
configuration.postLogoutRedirectUri: Enter the URI that you wish the app to redirect to after logout, e.g. http://localhost:4200

todoListApi.resourceUri: Enter the endpoint address of TodoList web API, e.g. https://localhost:44351/api/todolist
resourceScopes: Enter the API scopes as declared in the app registration 'Expose an API' blade in the form of 'api://{service-clientId}/access_as_user'
